channel.title: Looking for a Trusted Hoster for my Server
channel.description: first off, i want a no-ip, i cant figure out my router.. the server will be no-ip for sometime and then hamachi for the rest of the day get it? you must have either, msn, aim or yahoo. the server must NOT lag.. i'll run hamachi and you will run the no-ip.. you will be co-owner of the server.. post here if i intrested -.-

Well if there out of school they have time to run the server, so they can, im talking about the people who actually go to school, like me, but school ends on wendesday for summer vacation, so i wouldn’t have a problem.

when u can run it u can and when u cant ill run it with hamachi
